short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful new tab chrome extension - OSS Project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi! This is ToDo Tab!

This app is build for Chrome extension.
When you add a new tab, this extension will open a ToDo Tab!
This app includes following features.

- ToDo (Like trello)
- Dates, Time, Weather of Current location and etc...
- Theme picker

All features can run on offline and auto save at web browser storage. (except weather information)
